participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: outgoing and hard-working, enjoys the simple pleasures of life.
participant_1.background: i help tend the fields. i like to ride horses. my father is a farmer. i like to listen to rock music while working.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: frustrated and disillusioned, feeling stuck in a rut and yearning for change.
participant_2.background: i'm 40 years old. my wife spends all my money. i work as a car salesman. i am planning on getting a divorce. i hate my job.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
